name: The Sinking of the Perdua
description:
The Sinking of the Perdua is a social and exploration-focused one-off 5-hour adventure for 4th-6th level characters, compatible with D&D 5e. As it is published under OGL, everything that you need to play (from listed statblocks to character creation) this is freely available here: https://media.wizards.com/2016/downloads/DND/SRD-OGL_V5.1.pdf

Messages in bottles have been washing up on the shore of Ansafalle for some time now, telling tales of the Perdua - a shipwreck, out in the mists, where anything lost can be found. Investigating the claims guarantees gold, and promises much, much more - but a nightmarish lesson on the dangers of magic lurks out in the middle of the ocean...

The Sinking of the Perdua is written as the first in the upcoming Adventurers of Ansafalle series, a selection of adventures that can be played as standalone one-shots, or together as a mini-campaign.

Trigger warnings: the adventure deals heavily in ideas around loss, imprisonment and isolation.

Safety tools: If your gaming group doesn't have established or favoured tools, pause cards/x cards, lines and veils should be used with this game. Details are available here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/114jRmhzBpdqkAlhmveis0nmW73qkAZCj
